title: visual studio导入示例报错
author: guaiMiao~
txt_content:
按照这里说的导入到visual studio后报错“https://github.com/Element-0/Ele ... reate-a-custom-mod-(legacy)”



报错信息.txt
(647 Bytes, 下载次数: 3)



2020-6-22 13:39 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 阴阳师元素祭祀 于 2020-6-22 13:54 编辑 

请自行安装SQLiteCpp库
并且配置到全局cmake package里面 (项目configuration里面添加该package也行)

或者按照那边的说法安装第三方依赖



Install vcpkg in source tree cd vcpkg && bootstrap-vcpkg.bat
Install dependencies by vcpkg\vcpkg.exe install @vcpkg.txt (run in $(SolutionDir))
